```{r}
#| label: init
#| include: false

library("targets")
library("BayesFactor")
library("dplyr")

tested_terms <- function(x, denominator = length(x)) {
  lapply(
    x@numerator
    , \(y) {
      BayesFactor:::whichOmitted(
        y
        , x@denominator
      )
    }
  ) |>
  unlist(use.names = FALSE)
}

bf_table <- function(x) {
  x <-  do.call(c, args = x)
  
  x <- x[-length(x)] / x[length(x)]

  extractBF(x, logbf = TRUE) |>
    tibble() |>
    mutate(
      term = tested_terms(x)
      , bf = exp(-bf)
    ) |>
    select(term, bf, error)
}
```

# Full ANOVA

